item.title: UT-24 East at UT-260 North
item.description: UT-24 East at UT-260 North. Use UT-260 for US-50 and I-15 (via US-50).

item.title: UT-24 West at I-70 (UT-259)
item.description: UT-24 west at I-70 east to Denver. There is a signed state highway, UT-259, that connects UT-24 to the I-70 ramps. This sign has been replaced in recent years to include the UTAH text in the I-70 shield.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. Use UT-24 east for Green River; use UT-24 west for Richfield.

item.title: End UT-24 at US-50.
item.description: End UT-24 at US-50 in Salina.

item.title: End UT-24 at US-50
item.description: End UT-24 at US-50 in Salina.

item.title: UT-24 west at UT-260
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-260 north to Aurora and Scipio. Continue west on UT-24 for Salina.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-259
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-259 junction. UT-259 is a short spur between UT-24 and I-70.

item.title: UT-24 West at I-70 (UT-259)
item.description: UT-24 west at I-70 east to Denver. There is a signed state highway, UT-259, that connects UT-24 to the I-70 ramps.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-118
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-118. Turn right to continue west on UT-24.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-118
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-118. Turn right on UT-24 for Salina. Turn left on UT-118 for Richfield.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-119
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-119 west to Richfield. Continue west on UT-24 for Salina.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-119
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-119 in Sevier County.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-62 West
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-62 west in Sevier County.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-62
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-62 west to Koosharem and Panguitch.

item.title: UT-24 West at Koosharem Cutoff
item.description: UT-24 West at Koosharem Cutoff in Sevier County.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-25
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-25 in Piute County.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-25
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-25 to Fishlake. Continue west on UT-24 for Richfield.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-25
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-25 in Piute County. UT-25 is part of the Fish Lake Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-24 West - Piute County
item.description: Entering Piute County on UT-24 west.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-72
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-72 in Loa.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-72
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-72. Turn right on UT-72 for Fremont. Merge left on UT-24 for Richfield.

item.title: UT-24 West at UT-12
item.description: UT-24 west at UT-12 near Torrey.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-12
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-12 west to Grover, Boulder, and Escalante. Continue west on UT-24 for Torrey.

item.title: UT-24 West Approaching UT-12
item.description: UT-24 west approaching UT-12 near Torrey.

item.title: UT-24 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-24 west, leaving Hanksville. Distance to Capitol Reef National Park, Bicknell, Loa, and Richfield.

item.title: End UT-95 at UT-24
item.description: End UT-95 at UT-24 in Hanksville.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. Use UT-24 east for Green River; use UT-24 west for Capitol Reef National Park and Richfield.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. UT-24 west of Hanksville is designated the Capitol Reef Country Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-95 in Hanksville.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-95. Turn left to continue east on UT-24 towards Green River. Continue ahead for UT-95 east towards Lake Powell.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east approaching UT-95 in Hanksville. UT-95 is a Utah Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-12
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-12 west to Grover and Boulder. Continue east on UT-24 to Hanksville.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-72 North
item.description: UT-24 East at UT-72 North in Loa.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-62
item.description: UT-24 East at UT-62 West.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-62 West
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-62 west to Koosharem. Continue east on UT-24 for Fish Lake and Loa.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-119
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-119 west.

item.title: End UT-260 at UT-24
item.description: End UT-260 at UT-24. Turn right on UT-24 east for Sigurd and Richfield, and for access to I-70 and US-89. Turn left on UT-24 for Salina.

item.title: US-50 West at UT-24 East
item.description: UT-24 south on US-50 west.

item.title: US-89 North/US-50 Jct. - Salina
item.description: US-50 west/US-89 north split. Continue on US-89 for Gunnison and Salt Lake. Use US-50 west for UT-24 and Delta.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 149
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 149 - UT-24 West/Hanksville.

item.title: I-70 West Approaching Exit 149
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 149. Use Exit 149 for Capitol Reef and Lake Powell.

item.title: US-50 West at UT-24 East
item.description: US-50 west at UT-24 junction near Aurora.

item.title: US-50 West at UT-24 East
item.description: UT-24/US-50 split near Aurora.

item.title: US-89 South at US-50
item.description: US-89/US-50 junction To UT-24/To I-70 in Salina.

item.title: UT-24 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance to Sigurd and Richfield on UT-24 east, near Sigurd.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-118
item.description: UT-24/UT-118 junction to Richfield and Sigurd. UT-118 follows the old route of US-89 through the Seiver Valley. US-89 now is cosigned with I-70.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-118
item.description: UT-24/UT-118 junction near Sigurd.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-259 (To I-70)
item.description: US-24 east at UT-259 junction near Sigurd. UT-259 is a short spur which connects I-70 at Exit 59 to UT-24

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-259 to I-70
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-259 junction to I-70/US-89 near Sigurd.
